description: Custom function implementation of REST API for Evidence

inputs.description: Id of the container to which you are adding evidence.
inputs.name: container_id

inputs.description: Id of object to be added - artifact id, note id, etc.
inputs.name: object_id

inputs.description:
The content type of the object to add as evidence. One of the types:
containerattachment
artifact
actionrun
container
note
inputs.name: content_type
inputs.placeholder: See help text for supported types
